SuperStructureProducts.description:
As Dizayn Group, we offer durable and long-lasting solutions with superior quality pipe systems developed with our 37 years of experience and R&D studies. 
With their energy efficiency, environmentally friendly and hygienic features, our products are ideal for reliable and sustainable projects.
SuperStructureProducts.description2: Take your projects a step further with Dizayn Group's superior solutions in indoor pipe systems. It offers energy efficiency, hygiene, and long-lasting use.

elitePipe.title: Elite Pipe
elitePipe.description:
ElitePipe is a safe and long-lasting pipe system with high temperature and pressure resistance. 
By combining the advantages of PPR, PEX and PERT pipes, it provides superior performance and durability.

highlights.highPressure: High Compressive Strength at High Temperature
highlights.kangal: Ease of Shipment in Kangal Form
highlights.durable: Break Resistance Even at Minus 40 Degrees

sterilePipe.title: Sterile Pipe
sterilePipe.description: Sterile Pipe is an innovative pipe system that sterilizes up to 99.9% of the water passing through it by destroying bacteria, mold, fungi and other microbial creatures.

softPowerPipe.title: SoftPower Pipe
softPowerPipe.description: SoftPower Pipe is a durable and long-lasting pipe system made of PE63 raw material, offering high oxidation resistance, flexibility and easy installation.

elasticaPipe.title: Elastica Pipe
elasticaPipe.description:
Elastica Pipe is an innovative pipe system that stands out with its resistance to high temperature and pressure, flexible structure and ease of installation. 
It can be used safely in both underfloor heating systems and radiator installations.

nanotechPipe.title: NanoTech Waste Water Pipe
nanotechPipe.description:
NanoTech Waste Water Pipe is a sound-insulating, highly durable and long-lasting pipe system. 
It is an ideal solution for indoor and outdoor wastewater discharge.

triplexPipe.title: Triplex Waste Water Pipes
triplexPipe.description: Triplex Waste Water Pipes are a high-durability and long-lasting pipe system laid for the discharge of used water inside and outside the building.

pprPipe.title: PPR Pipe
pprPipe.description: PPR Pipe and fittings are produced from Polypropylene Random Copolymer raw material, which has low melt flow index, high molecular weight and high flexibility.

telecomPipe.title: Telecom Pipes
telecomPipe.description:
Cable Casing Pipes are used in rapidly developing communication and data transmission piping systems. 
It is offered with different options, from single to triple, in accordance with the demand and specification. 
It offers a whole system with additional parts that are eye multipliers and complementary elements.

korugePipe.title: Corrugated Pipe
korugePipe.description: Corrugated Pipes offer high durability and long life in sewer systems.

korugeSpiralPipe.title: Dizayn Corrugated Spiral Pipe
korugeSpiralPipe.description:
Corrugated spiral pipes have a double-layer structure consisting of inner and outer layers. 
The inner layer is a flat surface pipe that carries the fluid. 
The outer layer has a ribbed structure. 
It is produced from Polyethylene and Polypropylene raw materials.

pe80Pipe.title: Dizayn PE 80 Natural Gas Pipe
pe80Pipe.description:
Dizayn PE 80 Natural Gas Pipes and Fittings offer reliable and durable solutions in natural gas lines. 
These pipes, which are light, flexible and impact resistant thanks to the use of polyethylene material, can be used safely in natural gas lines.

jeotermalPipe.title: Dizayn Geothermal Pipe
jeotermalPipe.description: Dizayn Geothermal Pipes are composite pipes that prevent the heat transfer of hot and cold fluids.

denizDesarjPipe.title: Dizayn Marine Discharge Pipes
denizDesarjPipe.description: Dizayn Marine Discharge Pipes are designed for the safe and efficient discharge of wastewater in seas, lakes and rivers.

chemicalTank.title: Design Chemical Tanks
chemicalTank.description: Dizayn Chemical Tanks are designed for the safe and efficient storage of corrosive chemicals.

softPowerPipe.title: SoftPower Pipe
softPowerPipe.description: SoftPower Pipe is a durable and long-lasting pipe system made of PE63 raw material, offering high oxidation resistance, flexibility and easy installation.

rtpPipe.title: RTP Pipe
rtpPipe.description:
RTP (Reinforced Thermoplastic Pipe) Pipes are suitable for all kinds of water, gas, oil, etc. with high pressure resistance. 
is used for transportation. 
While it resists high pressures like steel pipes with its strong composite structure, it offers all the advantages of plastic pipes to its users with its thermoplastic raw material.

Products.description: Meet our new generation, high-tech pipes.

NewTechPipe.description: Meet our new generation, high-tech pipes.

content.0:
Mir Holding was established 37 years ago. 
The philosophy of our first established company was shaped on R&D (research and development). 
Our first R&D output was "on the subject of pipes" and from there Dizayn Group was born. 
As of today, Dizayn Group, our first industrial company, produces pipes for various sectors with diameters from 20 mm to 8 m and pressures from 0.5 Bar to 200 Bar.
content.2:
It has factories in Türkiye, Germany, Azerbaijan and the Russian Federation.               
Germany
content.3: He is also a partner and Board Member of Mir Holding Istanbul University Technopark.
content.6: It has more than 100 patents, 70% of which have been converted into production.
content.7: - It has the largest private research laboratory in Turkey.
content.8:
It has successfully completed the defense industry's largest budget (10.2 million USD) project (a material ten times stronger than steel and five times lighter). 
It is the third company worldwide to have this technology, after America and Canada.
content.10: The 2 billion USD SERAKENT project investment in Eskişehir is progressing rapidly.
content.11:
We achieved this success together with all our stakeholders. 
I express my deep gratitude to them.
content.12: İbrahim Mirmahmutoğulları Chairman of the Board of Directors of Mir Holding

content.0: QUALITY REACHING THE CONTINENTS FOR 37 YEARS
content.1:
Dizayn Group, which was established in 1987 to carry out research and development activities, took the first steps towards its current structure in 1991 by producing PPR pipes and fittings with specially designed molecular structure, which was its first R&D output. 
As Dizayn brand became identified with the production and sales of pipes and their elements over time, it was positioned as a pipe brand and our R&D company was given an independent structure under the name Mir AR&GE.             
Dizayn Group, together with our Mir R&D company and other subsidiaries, was gathered under the umbrella of Mir Holding as of 2010.
content.2:
Dizayn Group, which has produced firsts for Turkey in 37 years, broken world records, and become a leading company in technology in its sector with dozens of patents it has turned into industry, has exported to more than 85 countries and become a world brand with its experience and high production power. 
With the factory it opened in Russia in 2015 and the investment it made in Europe in 2016, it set the milestones to become a local brand in the important markets in which it carries its name.
content.3: Adopting continuous development for the development of Turkey and the welfare of its stakeholders, Dizayn Group expresses its gratitude to all its stakeholders with whom it has "designed" 37 years together, and continues to take steps to increase the benefits it offers to the whole world in order to "design" the coming years together.

content.0: To become a world brand by producing new technologies that will make a difference in the transportation of fluids.
content.1:
In order to transport fluids with the most optimal method; 
To achieve being a reliable and efficient company by developing problem-specific projects, products and systems with the right technology.
content.3:
Staying away from products that everyone produces or can produce. 
- To produce products that are competitive in terms of quality and price. 
- Being able to think of differences that create value that competitors have not thought of yet. 
- Focusing on products as much as possible. 
- To achieve a sense of completeness in everything we work on. 
- Never imitate the product of a national or international competitor. 
- To create privileges in all developed products and to achieve legal protection with patents.

content.1:
Just as people have ideals, institutions should also have ideals. 
It is inevitable that a system based solely on material expectations will get out of control.             
The trouble the world is in today
content.2: Just as individuals must be moral, institutions and products must also be moral.
content.3: He is sensitive to the environment while producing, he is responsible for owning his own waste, he is motivated by the existence of the people he employs, he feels the excitement of what he brings to his country while exporting, and most importantly, he feels at peace with the feeling that the product he produces will be a solution to the basic needs of humanity, and finally he spends a reasonable portion of his earnings in his country, which will not hinder his own growth. Using it as a cure for a problem of people living anywhere in the world or the nature that gives life to those people constitutes the definition of the morality of the institution and the product it produces.
content.4:
In our opinion, individuals should also be moral, products should also be moral, institutions should also be moral. 
No private or legal entity that bases its life on this philosophy can create problems for the world. 
The happiest family, the best citizen, the most successful manager and the individuals who enlighten those around them with their presence can only come from people who have internalized this kind of approach.
content.5:
We know our responsibilities. 
The world needs Design.
content.6: İbrahim MİRMAHMUTOĞULLARI Chairman of the Board of Directors
